results.title: The New councillor
results.brief_description: Through the experiences of Richards, a newly elected borough councillor, shows the varied activities of a typical councillor - the people’s relationship both with the people who elected him and the permanent officials who carry out the policy laid down by the council.

results.title: Neorealism
results.brief_description: Documentary exploring the Italian film movement, Neo-realism, which developed during World War II and dealt with moral, social and political problems in real locations. Includes interviews with Roberto Rossellini, Vittorio De Sica, Michaelangelo Antonioni, Pier Paolo Pasolini and Bernardo Bertolucci. Features film clips from Rossellini’s “Rome, open city” and “Paisa” and De Sica’s “Umberto D”.

results.title: Nebule
results.creator_credit: Bernard Longpre, Rene Jodoin and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: In this animated film a black line becomes a magic cord to serve a small child’s fancy. In Nebule’s hands it becomes whatever he wills and the metamorphoses, played out against a soft, pastelcolored background, encompass the world of a child’s fears and fancies. A film without narration.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bernard Longpre, Rene Jodoin and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: Nature's plan
results.creator_credit: George Brewer, John C. Gibbs, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and The Conservation Foundation
results.brief_description: This film describes the water cycle as Nature’s plan for providing all living things with life-giving water. Describes how water form the ocean is drawn into the air by evaporation, formed into clouds, condensed to water, delivered to the earth and returned to the ocean. Natural and time-lapse photography combine with animated drawings to clarify the mechanics of the water cycle and to describe and contrast various water cycle patterns in North America.
results.creator_credit_for_label: George Brewer, John C. Gibbs, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and The Conservation Foundation

results.title: Music of India: drums
